channel.title: portugal on madewhere
channel.description: Recent content in portugal on madewhere

item.title: Le Creuset
item.description: Le Creuset is a famous cast iron bakeware manufacturer. Probably best known for their Dutch ovens, but they make a considerable variety of kitchen products. While many of their cast iron products are made in France, this does not extend to all of their product lines, which are made in a variety of countries.

item.title: Mission Workshop
item.description: Mission Workshop is a San Francisco-based maker of bags and technical clothing; they focused mostly on bike gear, but have since diversified into more technical wear. Much of their technical gear isn’t made in the USA, so be sure to check on a product-by-product basis.
